mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_POST ( BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_P_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, USER_SEQ, FILE_ID, BOARD_LEVEL, EXP_YN ) VALUES ( #{boardSeq}, BOARD_P_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{userSeq}, '-1', #{boardSeq}, '1' )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_P_SEQ AS boardPSeq, TITLE AS title, CONTENT, REG_DATE AS regDate, USER_NICK AS userNick FROM BOARD_POST INNER JOIN USER_INFO ON BOARD_POST.USER_SEQ = USER_INFO.USER_SEQ WHERE BOARD_SEQ = '2' ORDER BY BOARD_P_SEQ DESC
SELECT BOARD_P_SEQ AS boardPSeq, TITLE AS title, CONTENT, REG_DATE AS regDate FROM BOARD_POST WHERE BOARD_SEQ='1' ORDER BY BOARD_P_SEQ DESC

SELECT BOARD_SEQ AS boardSeq, BOARD_P_SEQ AS boardPSeq, TITLE AS title, CONTENT, REG_DATE AS regDate, USER_NICK AS userNick FROM BOARD_POST INNER JOIN USER_INFO ON BOARD_POST.USER_SEQ = USER_INFO.USER_SEQ WHERE BOARD_P_SEQ = #{boardPSeq}
SELECT BOARD_SEQ AS boardSeq, BOARD_P_SEQ AS boardPSeq, TITLE AS title, CONTENT, REG_DATE AS regDate FROM BOARD_POST WHERE BOARD_P_SEQ = #{boardPSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_POST SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, REG_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_P_SEQ=#{boardPSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_REPLE ( REPLE_SEQ, BOARD_P_SEQ, USER_SEQ, CONTENT, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( REPLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardPSeq}, #{userSeq}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_P_SEQ as boardPSeq, USER_SEQ as userSeq, BOARD_REPLE_CONTENT, REG_DATE as regDate FROM BOARD_REPLE WHERE BOARD_P_SEQ=#{boardPSeq} ORDER BY REPLE_SEQ ASC
